PositionHistory.Title: Engineering Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
Company name: Western Union(Fintech)
Technology: Python, Javascript, Salesforce, Exacttarget, Experian, Ruby on Rails(ROR), Cloud, , Java, Heroku,
Amazon  and Reactjs.

●	Engineering Head (leading a team of 20+ engineers, designers for the  mobile and webs applications, in both Agile and SDLC way)
●	Interaction with product owners to create epics, user stories, sprint planning, team meeting.
●	Task estimation, team velocity, and to follow project deadline.
●	Define technology architecture, design and roadmap.
●	Define Architecture, set up Amazon servers, CI/CD, cloud for both UAT and for the production
environment.
●	Assess risk as well as security, performance, and scalability
●	Provide insights into software, new technology, and trends
●	Work with the executive team to define goals and manage progress
●	Lead software integration with partners
●	Team members empowerment, set rules to go live and defining Definition of Done(DOD).
●	Coordinate and communicate with the offshore team.
●	Interaction with senior manager and to provide Daily/Weekly/Monthly status, to create APAC
worksheet.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 63% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Engineering Head
PositionHistory.Description:
Client: Aligntech(Consumer, professional and Doctor store websites, e-commerce)
Technology: Python, Javascript, Salesforce, Exacttarget, Experian, Ruby on Rails(ROR), Cloud, , Java, Heroku,
Amazon  and Reactjs.

●	Engineering Head (leading a team of 20+ engineers, mobile and webs applications) and Scrum Master
(Scrum of Scrum team) leading a cross functional team.
●	Responsible for writing code, test cases (95% test coverage), peer programming and code
review(Github) and to overall follow process.
●	Team members empowerment, set rules to go live and defining Definition of Done(DOD).
●	Coordinate and communicate with the offshore team.
●	Team empowerment and to define DOD.
●	Work with Devops team for the automation by using automation tools for the deployment, testing
and for the repetitive process.
●	Billions of records databases management through tools like Solr, Hadoop.
●	Interaction with senior manager and to provide Daily/Weekly/Monthly status, to create APAC
worksheet.
●	Good knowledge of Digital technologies like A/B Testing configuration and SEO, SCM, Cost per click & conversation ratio.
●	Platform scalability and concurrency performance.
●	Facilitate sprint planning, daily scrums, retrospectives, stakeholder meetings, software
demonstrations, requirements definition, design and implementation of integrations and enterprise
services.
●	Working with business owners to propose high-quality user experience solutions for web and mobile applications and to map requirements into technical and functional documents.
●	Responsible for working with the configuration management and administration teams to provide
accurate build and deployment instructions.
●	SEO & SCM - Search volume & keyword selection.
●	Cost per click & conversation ratio.
●	Nurturing user data and increase user opts-in.
●	Creating KPI dashboard and Tag Management(UTM_SOURCE), Social media (Like Facebook, Twitter)
branding.
●	Managing all Digital marketing tools and provide training to the Associates.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 63% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Engineering Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
Java, Sinatra, BDD, Heroku, Html, JavaScript, Database
Client - Posten Norge(Online postal ecommerce service)
● Drive project and program delivery.
● Responsible for ensuring project delivery on time on schedule and with quality.
● Effectively communicate with team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion.
● Identify and resolve issues and conflicts within the program, projects and project management community
and with other stakeholders if necessary.
● Resolve issues at the project or line level and escalate issues which cannot be resolved in a timely and accurate manner.
● Manage key stakeholders and business and technology leads.
● Manage and communicate effectively with domain leads at senior level and working level teams.
● Responsible for ensuring project steering committee meetings, cross function meetings and other key
project meetings are effective and achieve objectives on a consistent manner.
● Change management.
● Responsible  for to drive the adoption of agile methodology across teams.
● Responsible  for to work with users to drive changes within the organization for projects implementation.
● Develop best practices and tools for project execution and management.
● Ensure utilization of standards and practices across all projects.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 41% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Client - ClearTrip
● As  a  scrum  master  facilitated  daily  scrum  meetings, sprint  planning, sprint  review, and  sprint
retrospective.
● Worked with the business analyst to understand the business requirement, use case analysis.
● Experience working with  diverse cross-functional teams.
● Work with development team, conflict resolution, team management, risk management.
● Interaction with the Product Owners to understand the project requirement and to create user story for
the development(BDD, TDD), by using Agile tools like Jira.
● Enforce Agile principle such as Automation testing, Continuous integration.
● Conduct Daily stand-up call, ATDD, Sprint Planning, Retrospective.
● Manage Kanban dashboard, Burn-down chart and to find team velocity.
● Project documentation through tools like Confluence/ Wiki.
● Enabled improvement in team delivery commitments and capacity planning for sprints by identifying & tracking hidden tasks that increased customer satisfaction.
● Team empowerment and to define DOD.
● Work with Devops team for the automation by using automation tools for the deployment, testing and for the repetitive process.

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Amit Agarwal's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Programming) and slightly concentrated in User Experience (mostly Web Design). Amit Agarwal has 13 years of work experience, with 8 years of management experience, including a high-level position.
